str: Your password must have a number.
Your password must contain an emoji.
Your password must include Avogadro's number (Use * and ^ or e, 2 decimal places, no spaces. Don't use +e).
The digits in your password must add up to 79.
Your password must contain today's date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Your password must include a product of two prime numbers. The product must be less than 100 but greater than 25
Your password must contain an English word that ends with 'mt'. The case should be the same as it is in the dictionary
